name: 501® Original Fit Women's Jeans
attribute.fittext: Mid rise: Sits at waist, Relaxed through hip and thigh, Straight leg
attribute.material: 100% Cotton (Non-Stretch Denim), 5-pocket styling, Button fly, Imported
attribute.description: A cultural icon. Always original. The 501® Jean is the first blue jean ever and has been a canvas for self-expression since Levi's® invented it in 1873. True to the original, this jean features the iconic straight fit and signature button fly and is made to last. Wear it relaxed and borrowed-from-the-boys or downsized and fitted, depending on your style.

• Designed to flatter, hold and lift
